name: Sergio – The Art To Foul
description:
They just call him Sergio. 
He's been terrorising national and international  football pitches for years.
He's been ruthless with his opponents . 
But his reign of terror is over now... it's time for revenge!

Game: 
Choose between 5 characters that Sergio has pissed off. 
Foul Sergio as often as you can and try to end his career. 
Can you defeat him?

W|A|S|D = move your player
SPACE= tackle Sergio
